text: Roland Mesnier (July 8, 1944 â€“ August 26, 2022) was a French-born American pastry chef and culinary writer. He was the Executive Pastry Chef from 1979 to 2004 at the White House. He was born in Bonnay, France. Mesnier died on August 26, 2022 in Burke, Virginia from problems caused by cancer, aged 78. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American chefs Category:French chefs Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. title: Roland Mesnier
